participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Michael takes pride in being a father and loves sharing stories about his children.
participant_1.background: He has a background in education and enjoys spending time with his family during weekends.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and supportive, Sarah often provides a listening ear and shares parenting tips with friends.
participant_2.background: She has a background in psychology and often works with families to strengthen their bonds.
